name: src/extensions/colOps/colOps.js
calc
description:
Calculates columns' values
Configuration options are stored in 'opts' property
- 'id' contains ids of elements showing result (array)
- 'col' contains the columns' indexes (array)
- 'operation' contains operation type (array, values: 'sum', 'mean',
  'min', 'max', 'median', 'q1', 'q3')
- 'write_method' array defines which method to use for displaying the
   result (innerHTML, setValue, createTextNode) - default: 'innerHTML'
- 'tot_row_index' defines in which row results are displayed
  (integers array)

- changes made by Nuovella:
(1) optimized the routine (now it will only process each column once),
(2) added calculations for the median, lower and upper quartile.

constructor
description:
TableFilter object constructor
requires `table` or `id` arguments, `row` and `configuration` optional

name: feature
description: Return a feature instance for a given name

name: initExtensions
description: Initialise all the extensions defined in the configuration object

name: destroyExtensions
description: Destroy all the extensions defined in the configuration object

description: Load themes defined in the configuration object

description: Remove all the external column filters

description: Check if given column implements a filter with custom options

name: getCustomOptions
description:
Returns an array [[value0, value1 ...],[text0, text1 ...]] with the
custom options values and texts

name: filter
description:
Filter the table by retrieving the data from each cell in every single
row and comparing it to the search term for current column. A row is
hidden when all the search terms are not found in inspected row.

name: getColValues
description: Return the data of a specified column

params.name: exclude
params.description: Optional: list of row indexes to be excluded

return.description: Flat list of data for a column

name: getFilterValue
description: Return the filter's value of a specified column

name: getFilterId
description: Return the ID of the filter of a specified column

name: getFiltersByType
description:
Return the list of ids of filters matching a specified type.
Note: hidden filters are also returned

params.name: bool
params.description: If true returns columns indexes instead of IDs

return.description: List of element IDs or column indexes

name: getFilterElement
description: Return the filter's DOM element for a given column

name: getCellsNb
description: Return the number of cells for a given row index

name: getRowsNb
description:
Return the number of filterable rows starting from reference row if
defined

name: getCellData
description: Return the data of a given cell

name: getTableData
description:
Return the table data with following format:
[
    [rowIndex, [value0, value1...]],
    [rowIndex, [value0, value1...]]
]

return.description: TODO: provide an API returning data in JSON format

name: getFilteredData
description:
Return the filtered data with following format:
[
    [rowIndex, [value0, value1...]],
    [rowIndex, [value0, value1...]]
]

return.description: TODO: provide an API returning data in JSON format

name: getFilteredDataCol
description: Return the filtered data for a given column index

return.description:
Flat list of values ['val0','val1','val2'...]

TODO: provide an API returning data in JSON format

name: setFilterValue

name: setColWidths

name: linkFilters

Refresh the filters subject to linking ('select', 'multiple',
'checklist' type)
